common.description: OPEN-API를 통하여 실명번호 또는 전산고객번호를 통하여 고객기본정보를 확인한다.

io.inbound: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="EUC-KR"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:p="http://schemas.ibk.com/mms/io/"> <xs:complexType name="MAPBS0123018_inbound"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="EDPS_CSN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>전산고객번호</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:LONG"> <xs:totalDigits value="10" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RNN"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>실명번호</xs:documentation> <xs:appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="1" /> <p:encryption value="Y" /> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:STRING"> <xs:maxLength value="20" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
io.outbound: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="EUC-KR"?> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:p="http://schemas.ibk.com/mms/io/"> <xs:complexType
